entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Snow level 1200 metres. Fog patches developing overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:37 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the morning. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:37 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023
